TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Quri, title = Quri, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quri} }

S.FORM: == Quri == i Taoyuan a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Quri. u kasalumaluma' nu Quri sa, 11 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 31 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 28 ku tademaw, pakalatu 90%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 3 ku tademaw, pakalatu 10%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 87%, zumazuma 3%. Quri i Hsinchu a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Quri. u kasalumaluma' nu Quri sa, 69 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 315 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 299 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 16 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5%. u kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 2%.

== Qori == i Taoyoan a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Qori. o kasalomaloma' no Qori sa, 11 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 31 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 28 ko tademaw, pakalato 90%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 3 ko tademaw, pakalato 10%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 87%, zomazoma 3%. Qori i Hsincho a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Qori. o kasalomaloma' no Qori sa, 69 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 315 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 299 ko tademaw, pakalato 95%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 16 ko tademaw, pakalato 5%. o kasabinacadan, Tayal 91%, Amis 1%, zomazoma 2%.
